sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { AuthContext } from '../../context/AuthContext' import "./AccountPage.css" export function AccountPage() { const {user, logout} = useContext(AuthContext); const [preview, setPreview] = useState(user?.avatar) return (

{user.name}

{user.email}

{Object.values(user.date).join(" ")}

{user.role}

) }
